Recording of recent research papers related to reinforcement learning for operations research problems.

<!-- ![](thumbnail.jpg) -->

## RL for inventory management

- F. Stranieri, F. Stella, and C. Kouki, “Performance of deep reinforcement learning algorithms in two-echelon inventory control systems,” Int. J. Prod. Res., vol. 62, no. 17, pp. 6211–6226, Sept. 2024. [Code](https://github.com/frenkowski/SCIMAI-Gym)
  - Method: 
    - MDP formulation; DRL algorithms; Balance allocation rule; 
    - BO for heuristic policies;
  - Problem: two-echelon inventory control systems, seasonal demand;
- X. Liu, C. Alexopoulos, and Y. Peng, “A simulation-driven machine learning framework for large-scale inventory management,” Ann. Oper. Res., pp. 1–27, Oct. 2025. [Code](https://github.com/xiaotianliu01/DRL_Large_Scale_Inventory)
  - Imitation learning with target heuristic policies
  - Real data from JD.com (not public)
  - Problem: Multi-product, single and multi-echelon
  - Computational complexity; Optimiality proofs; 
- T. Temizöz, C. Imdahl, R. Dijkman, D. Lamghari-Idrissi, and W. van Jaarsveld, “Deep controlled learning for inventory control,” Eur. J. Oper. Res., vol. 324, no. 1, pp. 104–117, July 2025. [Code written in C++](https://github.com/tarkantemizoz/DynaPlex)
  - Methods:
    - New algorithm, Deep controlled learning, for Input-Driven MDPs
    - RL as classification problem
  - Problem: lost sales, perishable inventory, and random lead times

## RL for operations research problems

- A. Ramanujam et al., “SafeOR-Gym: A benchmark suite for safe reinforcement learning algorithms on practical operations research problems,” arXiv [cs.LG], 02-June-2025. [Code](https://github.com/li-group/SafeOR-Gym)
  - Problems: 9 OR environments
  - Methods: Safe RL algorithms
    - Constrained Markov Decision Process (CMDP)
    - Constraints handling methods
    - Constraint RL algorithms
